General.Name: Korea New Network Co. Ltd
General.Description: Korea New Network Co., Ltd. engages in the TV and radio broadcasting, and advertising business in South Korea and internationally. It is also involved in cultural businesses. The company was formerly known as Busan Broadcasting Corp. and changed its name to Korea New Network Co., Ltd. in May 2006. Korea New Network Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
